name: create_test_fixture
doc: Creates a pytest fixture for step testing within the current project.

params.name: test_file_path
params.description: Path to the test file being executed, usually `__file__`.

params.name: fixture_name
params.description:
Name of the fixture to use as the argument in tests. By default
this will be `tester`.

returns.description:
A pytest fixture that will be scoped to the test module in which
it has been created.
